component.name: Extract Sample Currency Data
component.contactInfo: Flat File Source;Microsoft Corporation;Microsoft SqlServer v9; (C) 2005 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;1

property.name: RetainNulls
property.description: Specifies whether zero-length columns are treated as null.

property.name: FileNameColumnName
property.description: Specifies the name of an output column containing the file name. If no name is specified, no output column containing the file name will be generated.

property.name: FastParse
property.description: Indicates whether the column uses the faster, locale-neutral parsing routines.

property.name: FastParse
property.description: Indicates whether the column uses the faster, locale-neutral parsing routines.

property.name: FastParse
property.description: Indicates whether the column uses the faster, locale-neutral parsing routines.

property.name: FastParse
property.description: Indicates whether the column uses the faster, locale-neutral parsing routines.

outputColumn.name: Flat File Source Error Output Column
outputColumn.description: Flat File Source Error Output Column

component.name: Lookup CurrencyKey
component.description: Looks up values in a reference dataset by using exact matching.
component.contactInfo: Lookup;Microsoft Corporation;Microsoft SqlServer v9; (C) 2005 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;4

property.name: SqlCommand
property.description: Specifies the SQL statement that generates the lookup table.

properties.property: select * from (select * from [dbo].[DimCurrency]) as refTable where [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'ARS' OR [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'AUD' OR [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'BRL' OR [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'CAD' OR [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'CNY' OR [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'DEM' OR [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'EUR' OR [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'FRF' OR [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'GBP' OR [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'JPY' OR [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'MXN' OR [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'SAR' OR [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'USD' OR [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = 'VEB'

property.name: SqlCommandParam
property.description: Specifies a SQL statement that uses parameters to generate the lookup table.

properties.property: select * from (select * from [dbo].[DimCurrency]) as refTable where [refTable].[CurrencyAlternateKey] = ?

property.name: CacheType
property.description: Specifies the cache type of the lookup table.

property.name: MaxMemoryUsage
property.description: Maximum Memory Usage for Reference Cache on a 32 bit platform.

property.name: MaxMemoryUsage64
property.description: Maximum Memory Usage for Reference Cache on a 64 bit platform.

property.name: ReferenceMetadataXml
property.description: Indicates whether to reference metadata in an XML format.

properties.property: <referenceMetadata><referenceColumns><referenceColumn name="CurrencyKey" dataType="DT_I4" length="0" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="CurrencyAlternateKey" dataType="DT_WSTR" length="3" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="CurrencyName" dataType="DT_WSTR" length="50" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/></referenceColumns></referenceMetadata>

property.name: ParameterMap
property.description: Specifies the list of lineage identifiers that map to the parameters that the SQL statement in the SQLCommand property uses. Entries in the list are separated by semicolons.

property.name: DefaultCodePage
property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.

property.name: ConnectionType
property.description: Specifies the type of connection used to access the reference dataset.

property.name: NoMatchBehavior
property.description: Specifies how the Lookup transformation handles rows without matching entries in the reference data set.

property.name: NoMatchCachePercentage
property.description: Specifies the percentage of the cache that is allocated for rows with no matching entries in the reference dataset.

connection.name: OleDbConnection
connection.description: Connection manager used to access lookup data.

property.name: JoinToReferenceColumn
property.description: Specifies the column in the reference table that a column joins.

property.name: CopyFromReferenceColumn
property.description: Specifies the column in the reference table from which a column is copied.

property.name: CopyFromReferenceColumn
property.description: Specifies the column in the reference table from which a column is copied.

output.name: Lookup No Match Output
output.description: The Lookup output that handles rows with no matching entries in the reference dataset. Use this output when the NoMatchBehavior property is set to "Send rows with no matching entries to the no match output."

component.name: Lookup DateKey
component.description: Looks up values in a reference dataset by using exact matching.
component.contactInfo: Lookup;Microsoft Corporation;Microsoft SqlServer v9; (C) 2005 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;4

property.name: SqlCommand
property.description: Specifies the SQL statement that generates the lookup table.

property.name: SqlCommandParam
property.description: Specifies a SQL statement that uses parameters to generate the lookup table.

properties.property: select * from (select * from [dbo].[DimTime]) as refTable where [refTable].[FullDateAlternateKey] = ?

property.name: CacheType
property.description: Specifies the cache type of the lookup table.

property.name: MaxMemoryUsage
property.description: Maximum Memory Usage for Reference Cache on a 32 bit platform.

property.name: MaxMemoryUsage64
property.description: Maximum Memory Usage for Reference Cache on a 64 bit platform.

property.name: ReferenceMetadataXml
property.description: Indicates whether to reference metadata in an XML format.

properties.property: <referenceMetadata><referenceColumns><referenceColumn name="TimeKey" dataType="DT_I4" length="0" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="FullDateAlternateKey" dataType="DT_DBTIMESTAMP" length="0" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="DayNumberOfWeek" dataType="DT_UI1" length="0" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="EnglishDayNameOfWeek" dataType="DT_WSTR" length="10" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="SpanishDayNameOfWeek" dataType="DT_WSTR" length="10" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="FrenchDayNameOfWeek" dataType="DT_WSTR" length="10" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="DayNumberOfMonth" dataType="DT_UI1" length="0" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="DayNumberOfYear" dataType="DT_I2" length="0" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="WeekNumberOfYear" dataType="DT_UI1" length="0" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="EnglishMonthName" dataType="DT_WSTR" length="10" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="SpanishMonthName" dataType="DT_WSTR" length="10" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="FrenchMonthName" dataType="DT_WSTR" length="10" precision="0" scale="0" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="0"/><referenceColumn name="CalendarYear" dataType="DT_STR" length="4" precision="0" scale="0" codePage="1252"/><referenceColumn name="CalendarSemester" output.description: The Lookup output that handles rows with no matching entries in the reference dataset. Use this output when the NoMatchBehavior property is set to "Send rows with no matching entries to the no match output."

component.name: Sample OLE DB Destination
component.contactInfo: OLE DB Destination;Microsoft Corporation;Microsoft SqlServer v9; (C) 2005 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;4

property.name: CommandTimeout
property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.

property.name: OpenRowset
property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.

property.name: OpenRowsetVariable
property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.

property.name: SqlCommand
property.description: The SQL command to be executed.

property.name: DefaultCodePage
property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.

property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage
property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.

property.name: AccessMode
property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.

property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity
property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls
property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destinaton. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

property.name: FastLoadOptions
property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize
property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

connection.name: OleDbConnection
connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
